attributes.action: Demand that the Police and CPS prosecute MP's who have fiddled their expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Saying you forgot, didn't know, paid it back or that it was an admin error is no excuse in law. If some one claims benefits and they forget to report their circumstances have changed they will be prosecuted. MPs are no different and are not above the law. Send them to jail and throw away the key!

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
